title: 01/11/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 01/11/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin tried to make sense of the Steelers uninspired playoff performance vs the Browns and how Lamar Jackson was able to break through with his first playoff win. Howie Long gave us his thoughts on Super Wild Card weekend. Michael Vick told us why the Eagles decided to fire Doug Pederson, and Colin gave us his Right/Wrong from the weekend.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
